alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 22 at 5:03PM EST until January 22 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 615 PM EST. * At 503 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles south of Thomasville to 9 miles southwest of Crawfordville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello, Alma, Cody, Dills, Hells Half Acre, Lamont, Nash, Thomas City, Drifton, Casa Blanco, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Lake Miccosukee, Fincher, Goose Pasture, Festus, Aucilla, Capps and Lois. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
